message: Neh, I think separate topics are probably better. This has the potential to get very messy.
I just made this so people could ask questions directly without having to make a topic about it. Ask away.
Didn't we move to Convore to keep us from asking a whole bunch of questions in one thread?
Didn't we have a topic called "Don't be afraid of posting new topics!" to encourage people to make a topic for each question?

I guess... I always thought of topics as being a general topic of conversation, not just a straight question. Because you may have noticed, question topics tend to die very quickly. But anyway, ha-ha! I got you to post on my topic!
Okay fine, I'll ask my questions in separate topics. [grumble]
